## HackNet.numHashes() method

This function is only applicable for Hacknet Servers (the upgraded version of a Hacknet Node).

Returns the number of hashes you have.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
numHashes(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number

Number of hashes you have.

## Remarks

0 GB
